output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential exploitable vulnerability.
Integer overflow in setPrices function allows the owner to set the buyPrice and sellPrice to any value, causing a potential exploitable vulnerability.
buy function does not check return value of msg.sender.transfer(), allowing a potential trap due to integer overflow, causing a potential exploitable vulnerability.
sell function does not check return value of msg.sender.transfer(), allowing a potential trap due to integer overflow, causing a potential exploitable vulnerability.
transfer function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for 'amount' variable, causing a potential exploitable vulnerability.
